usage_method: Steep ginger (1-inch piece) and peppermint leaves (1 tsp) in hot water.
Mix turmeric powder (1 tsp) and honey (1 tsp) to form a paste, apply on the sores.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until healed

usage_method: Steep chamomile flowers (1 tbsp) and lavender flowers (1 tsp) in hot water for 5-7 minutes.
Steep echinacea flowers (1 tbsp) and garlic (1 clove) in hot water, use it as an eye wash.
dosage: Once a day until symptoms improve

usage_method: Boil ginger (1-inch piece) and clove (2-3 pieces) in water, drink warm.
dosage: Twice a day until symptoms resolve

usage_method: Boil turmeric powder (1 tsp) and ginger (1-inch piece) in water. Drink warm.
dosage: Once a day, preferably in the morning

usage_method: Steep cinnamon (1 stick) and clove (2-3 pieces) in hot water, drink warm.
dosage: Once a day, preferably before bed

usage_method: Apply aloe vera gel (1 tbsp) mixed with lavender oil (2-3 drops) to the affected area.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until relief is felt

usage_method: Mix turmeric powder (1 tsp) with honey (1 tsp) to form a paste, apply to the rash.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until the rash heals

usage_method: Apply tea tree oil (2 drops) diluted in chamomile tea (1 tsp) directly to acne spots.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until acne clears

usage_method: Apply arnica cream (a small amount) to the sprained area, use ginger tea (1 tsp) to drink.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day, and drink ginger tea once a day

usage_method: Apply lavender oil (2-3 drops) and tea tree oil (1 drop) to the wound for disinfection.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until healing is complete

usage_method: Use a saline solution made from salt (1/2 tsp) and warm water (1 cup) to rinse the nostrils.
dosage: Use once or twice a day, as needed

usage_method: Apply chamomile lotion (1 tbsp) and aloe vera gel (1 tbsp) to affected skin areas.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until symptoms subside

usage_method: Apply neem paste (1 tsp) mixed with turmeric powder (1/2 tsp) to the bite area.
dosage: Apply as needed, 2-3 times a day

usage_method: Apply crushed garlic (1 clove) and oregano oil (2-3 drops) to the affected area.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until the infection clears

usage_method: Massage tea tree oil (3 drops) and lavender oil (2 drops) into the scalp, leave for 15 minutes.

diseases: Tired or dry eyes (Mild dry eye syndrome)
Redness or irritation in the eyes
usage_method: Soak cotton pads in rose water and place them over closed eyes, or apply cucumber slices to the eyes for 10-15 minutes.
dosage: Use twice a day, morning and evening.

diseases: Skin irritation from heat or sun exposure
usage_method: Apply aloe vera gel (1 tbsp) with chamomile tea (1 tsp) to soothe the skin and reduce itching.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until symptoms subside.

usage_method: Chew cloves (2-3 pieces) and use peppermint oil (1 drop) to soothe the toothache.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day for relief.

usage_method: Crush garlic (1 clove) and ginger (1 small piece), mix with olive oil, and apply a few drops into the ear.
dosage: Apply once a day until pain subsides.

usage_method: Make a tea with fennel seeds (1 tsp) and coriander seeds (1 tsp), and drink after meals.
dosage: Drink once a day after meals.

usage_method: Inhale steam from eucalyptus (2-3 drops) and peppermint oil (1-2 drops) mixed in hot water.
dosage: Inhale twice a day, morning and evening.

diseases: Excessive sweating in certain areas (Mild hyperhidrosis)
usage_method: Use sage tea (1 tsp) and lavender oil (2 drops) applied to the affected area to reduce sweating.
dosage: Apply once a day, after showering.

diseases: Itchy skin due to fungal infections
usage_method: Apply tea tree oil (2-3 drops) mixed with lavender oil (1 drop) to the affected area.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until the infection clears.

diseases: Mild skin irritation (Due to chemicals or heat)
usage_method: Apply aloe vera gel (1 tbsp) mixed with coconut oil (1 tsp) to soothe the irritated skin.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day as needed.

usage_method: Apply aloe vera gel (1 tbsp) and cucumber slices directly to sunburned skin.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until the skin heals.

usage_method: Soak a cotton ball in tea tree oil (2-3 drops) and garlic paste (1 clove), and apply directly to the infected nail.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until symptoms subside.

usage_method: Crush 1 garlic clove and mix with grated ginger, apply paste to warts and cover with a bandage overnight.

diseases: Mild animal bites (Without risk of serious infection)
usage_method: Mix turmeric powder (1 tsp) and honey (1 tsp) to form a paste, apply to bite or wound area.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until healing occurs.

usage_method: Steep chamomile tea and lavender (1 tsp each), let it cool, and place a cotton ball over the affected eye.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until irritation subsides.

diseases: Toothache due to swollen gums (Mild gingivitis)
usage_method: Make a mouthwash by combining clove oil (2-3 drops) and peppermint oil (1 drop) in warm water, rinse mouth.
dosage: Use 2-3 times a day until symptoms improve.

usage_method: Take magnesium supplements (as per recommendation) and drink ginger tea (1 tsp ginger).
dosage: Drink 1-2 times a day until cramps subside.

usage_method: Make fennel and ginger tea by boiling 1 tsp of fennel seeds and ginger in water.
dosage: Drink once a day after meals.

diseases: Runny nose due to allergies (Mild allergic rhinitis)
usage_method: Inhale steam from eucalyptus oil (2 drops) and peppermint oil (1 drop) mixed in hot water.
dosage: Inhale 2-3 times a day as needed.

diseases: Constipation due to lack of fluids
usage_method: Drink a glass of water with cucumber (2 slices) and lemon (1 tsp of juice) every morning.
dosage: Drink daily to help with hydration and digestive health.

usage_method: Make a paste of turmeric and ginger (1 tsp each), mix with warm water, and apply to the affected area.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until pain decreases.

usage_method: Mix a few drops of tea tree oil with garlic oil and apply to the affected ear using a cotton ball.
dosage: Apply 1-2 times a day until symptoms improve.

usage_method: Apply aloe vera gel mixed with lavender oil (2-3 drops) directly to the affected skin area.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until itching subsides.

usage_method: Make tea by boiling ginger (1 tsp) and cinnamon (1 stick) in water.
dosage: Drink 1-2 times a day during menstruation.

diseases: Red eyes due to dust irritation
usage_method: Steep chamomile tea and add peppermint leaves, let it cool and place a cotton ball over the affected eye.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until symptoms ease.

usage_method: Mix turmeric powder (1 tsp) and honey (1 tsp), apply the paste to the mouth area or take it orally.
dosage: Use 2-3 times a day until symptoms improve.

diseases: Back pain due to incorrect sitting position
usage_method: Use lavender and chamomile essential oils in a diffuser or apply topically after mixing with carrier oil.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until the pain reduces.

usage_method: Apply a mixture of coconut oil (1 tsp) and honey (1 tsp) directly to the lips.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until lips heal.

usage_method: Make a paste with turmeric (1 tsp) and ginger (1 tsp), mix with warm water and apply to the affected joint area.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until symptoms improve.

usage_method: Prepare a tea by boiling cinnamon (1 stick) and ginger (1 tsp) in water.
dosage: Drink once a day during menstruation.

usage_method: Mix lemon juice (1 tsp) with honey (1 tsp) in warm water and drink.

diseases: Mild vomiting due to motion sickness
usage_method: Boil ginger (1 tsp) and peppermint leaves (2-3 leaves) together in water, then drink the tea.
dosage: Drink once before traveling or as needed.

usage_method: Prepare a tea by boiling cinnamon (1 stick) and ginger (1 tsp) in water.
dosage: Drink once or twice a day before meals.

usage_method: Mix coconut oil (1 tsp) and honey (1 tsp), and apply to the lips.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until lips are healed.

usage_method: Chew a few pieces of cloves (3-4 pieces) and cardamom (2 pods) after meals.
dosage: Chew after each meal to maintain fresh breath.

usage_method: Apply aloe vera gel mixed with lavender oil (2-3 drops) directly to the affected skin folds.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until itching subsides.

usage_method: Make a paste of turmeric (1 tsp) and ginger (1 tsp), mix with warm water and apply to the affected area.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until symptoms improve.

diseases: Mild skin infection due to flea or small insect bites
usage_method: Apply neem oil (1 tsp) mixed with tea tree oil (2-3 drops) directly to the affected area.
dosage: Apply 2-3 times a day until the infection heals.

usage_method: Boil rosemary (1 tsp) and thyme (1 tsp) in water, let it cool and rinse hair with the mixture.
dosage: Use once a day until lice are eliminated.

usage_method: Mix fresh lemon juice (1 tsp) with ginger (1 tsp) in water and drink.
dosage: Drink as needed to hydrate and refresh.

usage_method: Steep lavender and chamomile flowers (1 tsp each) in hot water and drink as a tea before bed.
dosage: Drink once a night before sleep.

usage_method: Steep peppermint (1-2 leaves) and ginger (1 tsp) in hot water, drink the tea after meals.

diseases: Symptoms of eye inflammation due to prolonged contact lens wear
usage_method: Turmeric helps with inflammation, and fennel has soothing properties for the eyes. Make a turmeric and fennel tea or use a cooled fennel tea compress for the eyes.
dosage: Apply a fennel tea compress to the eyes 2-3 times a day.

diseases: Hands feel stiff due to cold temperatures (mild frostbite)
usage_method: Cinnamon helps improve blood circulation, while clove has warming properties. Make a cinnamon and clove tea or apply a topical oil infusion for warmth.
dosage: Drink cinnamon and clove tea once a day or apply the oil mixture as needed.

diseases: Mild swelling in the abdomen due to excess gas
usage_method: Ginger helps alleviate digestive issues, and peppermint helps relieve bloating. Drink ginger and peppermint tea to relieve abdominal discomfort.
dosage: Drink after meals to reduce bloating, once or twice a day.

diseases: Eyes feel tired due to staring at the screen for too long
usage_method: Chamomile soothes the eyes, and lemon balm relaxes the muscles. Use chamomile tea as a compress for tired eyes, and drink lemon balm tea for relaxation.
dosage: Apply a chamomile compress to the eyes for 5-10 minutes or drink lemon balm tea before bed.

diseases: Nail discoloration due to lack of certain nutrients
usage_method: Nettle and dandelion are rich in vitamins and minerals, which help improve nail health. Drink nettle and dandelion tea to boost nutrition.
dosage: Drink 1-2 cups of nettle and dandelion tea daily to support nail health.

diseases: Mild inflammation of the skin due to sun exposure
usage_method: Aloe vera helps soothe and cool sunburned skin, while turmeric has anti-inflammatory properties. Apply aloe vera gel mixed with turmeric powder to the affected area.
dosage: Apply topically 2-3 times a day until the inflammation subsides.

diseases: Itchy sensation of the skin due to reaction to clothing
usage_method: Chamomile and lavender are known for their soothing properties. Use chamomile and lavender tea as a compress to relieve itching from skin irritation caused by clothing.
dosage: Soak a cloth in the tea and apply to the itchy area for 10-15 minutes, 2-3 times a day.

diseases: Pain in the gums due to plaque buildup
usage_method: Clove has natural analgesic properties that help relieve gum pain, and neem has antibacterial properties. Use neem powder mixed with clove oil as a paste to massage the gums.
dosage: Apply the paste to the gums once or twice a day, particularly before bedtime.

diseases: Redness of the face due to irritation of beauty products
usage_method: Aloe vera soothes skin irritation, and green tea has antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties. Apply aloe vera gel mixed with green tea extract to reduce redness.
dosage: Apply topically once or twice a day after cleansing the face.

diseases: Mental fatigue due to excessive work
usage_method: Ashwagandha is known to help with stress and fatigue, while tulsi promotes relaxation. Drink ashwagandha and tulsi tea to relieve mental fatigue.
dosage: Drink once or twice a day to help reduce stress and improve mental clarity.

diseases: Mild pain in the knee joints due to light exercise
usage_method: Ginger has anti-inflammatory properties, and turmeric reduces joint pain. Drink ginger and turmeric tea to relieve mild knee pain.
dosage: Drink once a day, particularly after exercise.

diseases: Temporary loss of appetite due to changes in the weather
usage_method: Peppermint stimulates digestion, and fennel aids appetite regulation. Drink peppermint and fennel tea to stimulate appetite.
dosage: Drink 1 cup of tea once or twice a day to promote hunger.

diseases: Pain in the shoulders due to heavy loads
usage_method: Ginger helps reduce muscle pain, while garlic has anti-inflammatory properties. Drink ginger and garlic tea to alleviate shoulder pain.
dosage: Drink once a day after intense physical activity.

diseases: Mild obstruction of the respiratory tract
usage_method: Eucalyptus has soothing effects on the respiratory tract, and thyme helps with bronchial issues. Use eucalyptus steam inhalation and drink thyme tea to relieve mild respiratory obstruction.
dosage: Inhale steam 2-3 times a day and drink thyme tea once or twice daily.

diseases: Mild dizziness due to lack of oxygen or fresh air
usage_method: Ginger improves circulation, and cinnamon provides warmth. Drink ginger and cinnamon tea to stimulate circulation and reduce dizziness.
dosage: Drink 1 cup of ginger and cinnamon tea when experiencing dizziness.

diseases: Temporary loss of balance due to disorders in the ear
Headache due to consuming foods containing MSG
usage_method: Ginger helps improve circulation, while peppermint has a calming effect on the nervous system and can ease headaches. Drink ginger and peppermint tea to reduce dizziness and relieve headaches caused by MSG.
dosage: Drink 1-2 cups per day, particularly when experiencing symptoms.

diseases: Pain in the feet due to tight or ill-fitting shoes
Swelling in the hands or feet due to fluid retention
usage_method: Lavender helps reduce pain, and eucalyptus has anti-inflammatory properties. Use a mixture of lavender and eucalyptus oils for a soothing foot and hand massage to relieve pain and swelling.
dosage: Massage the mixture into your feet or hands twice daily for relief.

diseases: Digestive disorders mild due to stress
Mild flu symptoms due to exposure to cold weather
usage_method: Chamomile helps calm the digestive system, while ashwagandha reduces stress, and both can help improve immunity. Drink chamomile and ashwagandha tea to support digestion and boost immunity during flu season.
dosage: Drink 1 cup of tea once or twice a day, preferably after meals.

usage_method: Ginger helps soothe the digestive system, while fennel alleviates bloating and gas. Drink ginger and fennel tea to relieve chest discomfort and mild stomach pain.
dosage: Drink 1 cup after meals to aid digestion and reduce bloating.

diseases: Red spots on the skin due to mild allergic reactions
Heat in the body due to mild fever
usage_method: Turmeric has anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, while cinnamon can help reduce inflammation and improve circulation. Use turmeric and cinnamon as a tea or add to food to relieve skin irritation and reduce fever.
dosage: Drink 1-2 cups of tea daily or use in cooking as desired.

diseases: Mild difficulty breathing due to allergies to dust
Mild ringing in the ears due to exposure to loud noises
usage_method: Ginger helps with respiratory issues, while peppermint has anti-inflammatory properties that can help with ear discomfort. Use a ginger and peppermint tea or an essential oil blend for inhalation.

diseases: Stomach cramps due to consuming certain foods
Pain in the abdomen due to bloating
usage_method: Turmeric is known for its anti-inflammatory properties, while cinnamon aids digestion. Drink a warm turmeric and cinnamon tea to ease stomach cramps and bloating.
dosage: Drink 1-2 cups per day after meals to support digestion.

Back pain due to bad posture
usage_method: Chamomile calms the nervous system, and lavender has pain-relieving properties. Use chamomile tea for anxiety and lavender oil for massages to relieve back pain.
dosage: Drink 1 cup of chamomile tea in the evening or use lavender oil for massage 2-3 times a day.

diseases: Mild earache due to exposure to loud noises
Partial hearing loss due to mild ear infections
usage_method: Garlic has antimicrobial properties, and eucalyptus can help clear the airways and relieve ear discomfort. Use garlic oil or garlic-based ear drops for ear infections and eucalyptus steam for soothing earaches.

Redness of the skin due to mild infections or rashes
usage_method: Aloe Vera soothes the skin, while calendula helps with inflammation. Apply aloe vera gel and calendula ointment for instant relief from skin irritation and redness.
